method.name: GetAllShoutsUsingSpell
method.blurb: Returns an array of all shouts that use a given spell.

description.p: This function scans through the list of all shouts in memory, and returns an array of all shouts that use the specified spell for any of their words.

method.name: GetAnyShoutUsingSpell
method.blurb: Returns the first found shout that uses a given spell.

description.p: This function scans through the list of all shouts in memory, and returns the first shout that uses the specified spell for any of its words.

method.name: GetAllShoutsUsingWord
method.blurb: Returns an array of all shouts that use a given word of power.

description.p: This function scans through the list of all shouts in memory, and returns an array of all shouts that use the specified word of power.

method.name: GetAnyShoutUsingWord
method.blurb: Returns the first found shout that uses a given word of power.

description.p: This function scans through the list of all shouts in memory, and returns the first shout that uses the specified word of power.

method.name: GetShoutMenuDisplayObject
method.blurb: Returns the menu display object used by a shout.

description.p: This function returns the menu display object used by the specified shout.

method.name: GetShoutRecoveryTimes
method.blurb: Returns an array of a shout's recovery times.

description.p: This function returns an array of the three recovery times that the specified shout uses.

method.name: GetShoutSpells
method.blurb: Returns an array of a shout's spells.

description.p: This function returns an array of the three spells that the specified shout uses.

method.name: GetShoutWords
method.blurb: Returns an array of a shout's word of power.

description.p: This function returns an array of the three words of power that the specified shout uses.
